name: Scrollbar Customizer
author: WPMighty

sections.description:
Scrollbar Customizer is an advanced WordPress plugin that let you easily customize and change the design and control of the scrollbar in your website.

The Key Features of Scrollbar Customizer

⭐ Customize dragger height
⭐ Customize bar width and side space
⭐ Customize bar background color
⭐ Customize dragger color
⭐ Change bar border radius
⭐ Compatible with all page builders
⭐ Compatible with all WordPress themes
⭐ Gutenberg compatible
⭐ Include pot file for translation
⭐ Compatible with last WordPress version
⭐ Lightweight and fast with no jQuery
⭐ Compatible with all modern browsers

Pro version Features

⭐ Dark mode theme support
⭐ Gradient dragger support
⭐ Change wheel speed
⭐ Size Animation on hover

Get pro version now
sections.changelog:
1.5.0

  • Improved: Freemius SDK Updated to last version
  • Improved: Support last WordPress version
  • Improved: Support PHP 8.2

1.4.0

  • Improved: Freemius SDK Updated to last version
  • Improved: Support last WordPress version
  • Improved: Support PHP 8.1+

1.2.0

  • Improved: Removed some non used CSS code [Assets]
  • Fixed: Wrong submenu placement [Backend]
  • Fixed: Wrong .pot file names [Language] [Backend]

1.1.1

  • Fixed: add missed esc_attr and esc_html in html outputs

1.1

  • Fixed: add missed esc_attr and esc_html in html outputs
  • Fixed: poor file location call

1.0

  • First public version.
